Anybody know a safe credit card in singapore for which it is very hard to do fraudulent transaction. Frequency of feaudulent transaction mishap on me and my wife cards over last year is crazily increasing and tells me it is so easy in usa to crack out as it does not require otp. Any advice?
not worth bah  might as well top up Amaze wallet directly (no cashback) and get 1% Instarem points rebate

no way to avoid  because the way that the fraud happens is by BIN attack. Advice is to go for a card that has responsive customer svc so that you can easily report and dispute transactions when they happen. Alternatively go for a card that you can use a one-off card number (e.g. Revolut) for online payments  but then you don't have a card that you can physically use
Unlock the card before you use n lock it immediately after you use.
What you can lock and unlock so easily?

I can unlock and lock my trust credit card. Their customer service quite responsive. The trust app have a chat feature. I used it when they accidentally lock my card when I in shanghai cos they suspect fraudulent transactions

Take note if itâ€™s locked  recurring transactions/bills will fail. BIN attack or brute force attack is hard to avoid since itâ€™s a mathematical issue. No choiceâ€¦OTP requirement is not controlled by banks but by merchants. American Express is known for very good customer service but trade off is acceptance
